column4: Started development of framework for Cockpit v2
Added Multi-service Proxy Panel

Refactored the codebase to improve performance and reduce bugs

Fixed various bugs and issues

Added RTX Widgets (Movie Banners / Sport Top / Sport TV Today) to Android Webviews
